subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: While New York buzzed over the Knicks’ trade for Carmelo Anthony, Isiah Thomas, believed by some to have helped orchestrate the deal, was quietly focused on his current team.
snippet: While New York buzzed over the Knicks’ trade for Carmelo Anthony, Isiah Thomas, believed by some to have helped orchestrate the deal, was quietly focused on his current team.
